text: Ketocaine (INN) (brand name Vericaina, former developmental code name Astra 2358 or A-2358) is an amino ether local anesthetic of the butyrophenone family used topically for pain relief which is marketed in Italy. ==References== Category:Phenol ethers Category:Aromatic ketones Category:Local anesthetics Category:Sodium channel blockers Category:Diisopropylamino compounds
title: Ketocaine
